Projects

My project portfolio mostly consists of personal side projects, but I've also included endeavours from hackathons, from student clubs, and from project-oriented lab classes. Many of the featured projects present design, hardware, software, and fabrication challenges, I've documented my solutions here.

15 Dec 2017

Waterproof Quadcopter Build

A waterproof quadcopter built around the crazyflie flight controller for a professor researching aquatic drone launches.

  • View Project
06 Dec 2017

Crazyflie Quadcopter Flight Controls

A cascased controller implementation for autonomous loitering with Crazyflie quadcopter.

  • View Project
08 Oct 2017

Photogrammetry 3D Scanner

A vision based 3D scanner utilizing photogrammetry to generate meshes, affectionately called 'Greg.'

  • View Project
15 Jul 2017

Custom Electric Longboard

An electric longboard with a handheld wireless controller.

  • View Project
15 Jun 2017

Midair Hotswap

A mechatronics platform designed to autonomously swap a quadcopter's battery, without touching the ground.

  • View Project
15 Dec 2016

Custom RC Transmitter

Part of my final project for Design Innovation 22, an Arduino driven RC Transmitter.

  • View Project

Part of my responsibilities as an undergraduate research assisstant in Pieter Abbeel's RLL at UC Berkeley.
